author: fern
description:
Want to restore the planet’s ecosystems and see your impact in monthly videos? The first 100 people to join Planet Wild with code FERN10 will get the first month for free at: https://planetwild.com/r/fern/join

If you want to get to know them better first, check out their project protecting one of Europe’s last ancient forests: https://planetwild.com/r/fern/m31 (ad)

The animals in Chernobyl are... different.

Our research is based on the following sources, among others:
https://www.geo.de/natur/tierwelt/tschernobyl--tiere-in-der-todeszone-30169168.html 
https://knowablemagazine.org/content/article/food-environment/2022/scientists-cant-agree-about-chernobyls-impact-wildlife 
https://www.npr.org/transcripts/1198909263
http://cricket.biol.sc.edu/chernobyl/papers/Moller-Mousseau-TREE-2016.pdf 

Sources: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Kp5Piq6LD4Y_WHQ1_KIA-zJlMbY3FYwSgdeS6KDCKnU/edit?usp=sharing

Music list:

Frank Schlimbach - Art of a Dead Man
Ace - Root Canal - Stripped Version
Dan
title: The Mutated Animals of Chernobyl
